title: Full Stack Developer
description: Brynga is a Canadian digital agency.
I am responsible for the development and maintenance of Web applications.
I'm using React with the Next.js Framework to create the FrontEnd.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: AO4 is a Full Service communication and technology agency.
I was responsible for the development and maintenance of an application in Front-End and Back-End.
I mostly used Angular on Front End, hosted on S3.
On the Back-End we build REST APIs using PHP, with the Laravel framework, running in a cluster on AWS ECS (with EC2), exposed via API Gateway.
We also use several tools on AWS, such as S3 Cloud Storage, Code Commit, among others.

title: Android Engineer
description: I was responsible for the development and maintenance of a Mobile application.
I mainly used Kotlin and Java.
For the architecture of the application, I used the MVVM pattern, widely used in applications with the Kotlin language.
I consumed an api in MongoDB.
In the code versioning part, I worked with Git, using the GitHub platform.

title: Mobile Developer
description: I was responsible for the development and maintenance of Mobile applications.
I mainly used Flutter and Java.
In the main application in Flutter:
I used powerful tools such as GetX, Provider, among others.
I consumed Cloud Firestore (Firebase) to save the data.
Authentication by Firebase.
Cloud Storage (Firebase).
In the Java application:
I used the MVVM architecture.
I consumed a Web service that was on its own server.
Database in MySQL.
In the code versioning part, I worked with Git, using the Azure DevOps Services platform and GitHub.

title: Web developer
description: Responsável pelo desenvolvimento e manutenção de uma aplicação ASP.NET Core.
Utlizei o padão MVC.
Tecnologias: Javascript, ASP.Net Web Forms, ASP.Net MVC, HTML5 CSS3.
Bancos de dados: Microsoft SQL Server e MySQL.
Processos de apoio ao desenvolvimento de software: Microsoft Team Foundation Server.
Atuei em um projeto destinado a corretores de seguro de vida e previdência com objetivo de captar informações para cálculo de prêmio de seguro.

title: Desenvolvedor Ionic
description: I was responsible for the development and maintenance of an EAD platform in Ionic.
I used in the Front End, mainly TypeScript and Java Script, in addition to CSS to style the application.
The application consumed the Moodle API, an open source learning management system used by hundreds of millions of students around the world.
The platform, in addition to the videos, had an evaluation feature that determined the score at the end of the course.
In the code versioning part, I worked with Git, using the GitLab platform.
